documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by
 a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.
@dev Returns the name of the token.

@dev Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the
 name.

Approval(address,address,address,uint256.details: Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.

Transfer(address,address,address,uint256.details: Emitted when `value` tokens are moved from one account (`from`) to another (`to`). Note that `value` may be zero.

name(address).details: Returns the name of the token.

symbol(address).details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.
